là
candle; wax
свеча; воск
rtega_mnemonic:
蝋蝋RS蠟𧒑wax, candle, waxy, glazed
  • wax made by bees 虫 used in candles when the mouse 鼡 is active (at night)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 蜡)
Pictophonetic: 巤 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蠟燭 [ là zhú ]: candle; Classifiers: 根
蠟染 [ là rǎn ]: batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 巤 [ liè ] a mouse's whiskers; a horse's mane; a fish's dorsal fin
heisig_chinese_memo: Some people set wax traps in their house which can easily trap a mouse or an insect.  That's what they have to worry about.
Ru_trainchinese:
là: (сущ) воск; свеча
zhà: (графема) жертвоприношение, которое совершалось в древнем Китае в конце каждого года
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the insect's (虫) mane (巤) catches in the candle
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In times past insects could eat the natural wax emitted from some plants, but not they can just feed on the mess that humans make when they create garbage.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " worm " and "巤", the original meaning is the oil produced by animals, plants or minerals, which is plastic and insoluble in water. The King of Han Fu "On the Latent-Concubine": "Knowing the fat wax can tell the stirrup, but if you don't know a lot of it, you can't."

" Wax " can mean candles. One of Tang Li Shangyin's "Untitled": "A half-cage gold jade is illuminated with wax, and hibiscus is slightly embroidered with musk smoke."

" Wax " also means to apply wax. Song Wang Anshi (Han Chiguo was released from Fuzhou): "When will we return, the sandals are still good."

" Wax " also means a light yellow color like wax. Song Fan Chengda's "Plum Tree": "The winter plum is not plum, because it is at the same time as plum, the fragrance is similar, and the color resembles honey spleen, hence the name winter plum.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " worm " and "巤", the original meaning is the oil produced by animals, plants or minerals. It is plastic and insoluble in water.
humanum_full_description:
從「虫」，「巤」聲，本義為動物、植物或礦物所產生的油質，具有可塑性，不溶於水。漢王符《潛夫論‧遏利》：「知脂蠟之可明鐙也，而不知其甚多則冥之。」

　　「蠟」可表示蠟燭。唐李商隱〈無題〉之一：「蠟照半籠金翡翠，麝熏微度繡芙蓉。」

　　「蠟」還表示用蠟塗抹。宋王安石〈韓持國從富州辟〉：「何時歸相過，游屐尚可蠟。」

　　「蠟」亦表示淡黃如蠟的顏色。宋范成大〈梅譜〉：「蠟梅本非梅類，以其與梅同時，香又相近，色酷似蜜脾，故名蠟梅。」
humanum_short_description: 從「虫」，「巤」聲，本義為動物、植物或礦物所產生的油質，具有可塑性，不溶於水。

Character decomposition 字形分解 :

從「 虫 」，「 巤 」聲，本義為動物、植物或礦物所產生的油質，具有可塑性，不溶於水。漢王符《潛夫論‧遏利》：「知脂蠟之可明鐙也，而不知其甚多則冥之。」 「 蠟 」可表示蠟燭。唐李商隱〈無題〉之一：「蠟照半籠金翡翠，麝熏微度繡芙蓉。」 「 蠟 」還表示用蠟塗抹。宋王安石〈韓持國從富州辟〉：「何時歸相過，游屐尚可蠟。」 「 蠟 」亦表示淡黃如蠟的顏色。宋范成大〈梅譜〉：「蠟梅本非梅類，以其與梅同時，香又相近，色酷似蜜脾，故名蠟梅。」
From the sound of " worm" and " 巤", the original meaning is the oil produced by animals, plants or minerals, which is plastic and insoluble in water. The King of Han Fu "On the Latent-Concubine": "Knowing the fat wax can tell the stirrup, but if you don't know a lot of it, you can't." " Wax" can mean candles. One of Tang Li Shangyin's "Untitled": "A half-cage gold jade is illuminated with wax, and hibiscus is slightly embroidered with musk smoke." " Wax" also means to apply wax. Song Wang Anshi (Han Chiguo was released from Fuzhou): "When will we return, the sandals are still good." " Wax" also means a light yellow color like wax. Song Fan Chengda's "Plum Tree": "The winter plum is not plum, because it is at the same time as plum, the fragrance is similar, and the color resembles honey spleen, hence the name winter plum.

蠟字的基本解释

蠟
là
见“蜡”。

蠟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［là］
［《廣韻》盧盍切，入盍，來。］
“蜡3”的繁体字。亦作“1”。

蠟字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠟； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1101第31
【唐韻】盧盍切【集韻】【韻會】力盍切，?音臘。【玉篇】蜜滓也。【陸佃云】蜂之化蜜，必取匽豬之水，注之蠟房，而後成蜜。故謂之蠟者，蜜之蹠也。【本草】蟲白蠟。【李時珍曰】蠟樹，四時不凋，五月開白花，成叢結實。其蟲大如蟣蝨，延緣樹枝，食汁吐涎，剝取其渣，煉化成蠟。又蜜蠟，生於蜜中。又水蠟，樹葉微似楡，及甜櫧樹，皆可放蟲產蠟。【晉書·阮孚傳】孚性好屐，或有詣阮，正見自蠟屐，曰：一生當著幾兩屐。【石崇傳】崇奢靡，以蠟代薪。【南史·王僧虔傳】少時，以燭淚澆成蠟鳳凰。　又蠟梅，花名。【蘇軾詩】蜜蜂採花作黃蠟，黃蠟爲花亦其物。　又蠟觜，鳥名。【本草】桑扈，一名蠟觜雀，其觜或凝黃如蠟。　【廣韻】俗作䗶。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　wax; Kangxi strokes: 21; page number: page 1101 to 31
[Tang Yun] Lu Qiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Li Qiqie, sound wax. [Jade articles] Michu also. 【Lu Dianyun】To make honey, bees must take water from pigs, pour it into wax house, and then turn into honey. Therefore, what is called wax is also the planter of honey. 【Materia Medica】Insect white wax. [Li Shizhen said] The wax tree does not wither at four o'clock. It blooms with white flowers in May and grows in thick clumps. The insects are as big as lice, spreading on the branches, spitting their juices, stripping their residue, and refining them into wax. And beeswax, born in honey. Water wax, leaves slightly like jasmine, and sweet castanopsis tree, can put insects to produce wax. [Book of Jin·The Biography of Ruan Fu] Fu's sexuality is good, or there may be ruan, I see myself in wax, saying: There are a few pairs of sandals in my life. [Shi Chong Chuan] Chong luxury and extravagant, with wax instead of salary. [Southern History·Wang Sengqian Biography] When I was young, I poured candle tears into a wax phoenix.　 Winter Plum, the name of the flower. 【Su Shi's poems】bees gather flowers to make yellow wax, and yellow wax is a flower and a thing.　Again, the name of the bird. 【Materia Medica】Sanghu, a wax finches, its scorpion or yellow as wax.　[Guangyun] Vulgarly written.
